ANSWER: Based on the diagnosis of Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS), I recommend a comprehensive treatment approach that combines evidence-based medical management with patient-centered care strategies. Long-term management involves regular follow-up to monitor symptoms, ensure adherence, and evaluate for any new or concerning features.
